attributes.action: Should our MPS accept the same retirement regulations as the general public?
attributes.background: General public had no say in loss of final salary pension scheme. In fairness, I would expect all  citizens (including MPs) to observe the same regulations.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

In any case, we could not accept your petition because MPs' pensions are set and regulated by the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/
